actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend titles II and XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that payments made to a deceased beneficiary and received by an entitled surviving beneficiary shall be considered overpayments, and shall be subject to the provisions of such Act relating to recovery, waiver of recovery, and adjustment of overpayments.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends titles II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) and XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to consider as overpayments the payments made to a deceased beneficiary that are received by an entitled surviving beneficiary.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles II and XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that payments made to a deceased beneficiary and received by an entitled surviving beneficiary shall be considered overpayments, and shall be subject to the provisions of such Act relating to recovery, waiver of recovery, and adjustment of overpayments.
